channel.title: Sna on Davide Vega D'Aurelio
channel.description: Recent content in Sna on Davide Vega D'Aurelio

item.title: Scalable Network Analysis Platform
item.description: The design of scalable solutions to analyze large complex data from social media have been an ongoing research problem with practical applications. The purpose of the project was to deploy a scalable computing architecture able to process real-time social media data, allowing data scientist to analyze temporal and linguistics trends in real-time. In particular, during this project the students aimed at (a) understanding how and what type of data we want to process and (b) implementing and evaluate a scalable solution to process and visualize large-scale data streams as complex networks in real time.
